articles.description: David Teague provides his thoughts post-Round 2.
articles.content:
WEVE got work to do. Weve got a lot of work to do and we need to do it.
Carlton was left to lament a breakdown in defensive system at the MCG on Thursday night, ultimately going down by 21 points to… [+2395 chars]
